title: Firefox 3 is out
author: VD
content_html: Here’s 10 reasons to download it. I’ve noticed that it’s a bit snappier than the previous version and uses less memory too. Now I’m just waiting for OpenOffice 3.0 and that PDF import feature….
content_text:
Here’s 10 reasons to
download it
.  I’ve noticed that it’s a bit snappier than the previous version and uses less memory too.  Now I’m just waiting for OpenOffice 3.0 and that PDF import feature….
